CalculateAbilityBonus(int?)

Calculate the ability score bonus.

public static int CalculateAbilityBonus(int? abilityScore)

Parameters

abilityScore int?

The relevant ability score. Example: 17.

Returns

int

Int representing ability bonus for the specified ability score. Example: 3.

CalculateExperiencePoints(double)

Calculate the XP of the creature based on its challenge rating.

public static int CalculateExperiencePoints(double challengeRating)

Parameters

challengeRating double

The double value of the creature's challenge rating. Example: 0.25.

Returns

int

Int value of experience points for the specified challenge rating. Example: 50.

Calculates the proficiency bonus for the moster based on its challenge rating.

public static int CalculateProficiencyBonus(double challengeRating)

Parameters

challengeRating double

The double value of the creature's challenge rating. Example: 0.25.

Returns

ConvertBonusToSignedString(int)

Adds a "+" or "-" to the bonus value.

public static string ConvertBonusToSignedString(int bonus)

Parameters

bonus int

Bonus value. e.g. 1.

Returns

string

Bonus value with "+" or "-" prepended to it. e.g. "+1".

ConvertChallengeRatingToDouble(string)

Converts challenge ratings string to a double value. Converts "1/4" to 0.25.

public static double? ConvertChallengeRatingToDouble(string challengeRating)

Parameters

challengeRating string

The string value of the creature's challenge rating. Example: "1/4".

Returns

double?

Double value of the challenge rating or null if it could not be converted. Example: 0.25.

ConvertChallengeRatingToString(double)

Converts challenge ratings double to a string value. Converts 0.25 to "1/4".

public static string? ConvertChallengeRatingToString(double challengeRating)

Parameters

challengeRating double

The double value of the creature's challenge rating. Example: 0.25.

Returns

string

String value of the challenge rating or null if it could not be converted. Example: "1/4".

ParseAttributeValue(string?, string?)

Searches a CSV string for the integer value associated with the specified attribute.

public static int? ParseAttributeValue(string? csv, string? attributeName)

Parameters

csv string

A comma separated list of values to search. Example: "darkvision 120 ft., Passive Perception 20".

attributeName string

The name of the attribute to search for. Example: "passive perception" (case insensitive).

Returns

int?

Integer associated with the attribute or null if attribute is not found. Example: 20.
